name: Brown Bear Leg Armor
description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade toBone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with theCalibrated Grip Attachments andAttack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.
